Package co.uk.niadel.mpi.events.entity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventEntityDeath  
    EventEntityLivingInit
    This can be considered incredibly powerful, as you can manipulate AI and other things with this.
    EventEntityPickupItem
    Fired when an entity picks up an item.
    EventEntitySpawned  
    EventEntityStruckByLightning
    Can be used to do things like turn an enderman into a creeper when it's hit by lightning.
    EventExplosion  
    EventPlayerSpawned  
    EventReadEntityFromNBT
    Fired when an entity reads data from it's NBT.
    EventUpdateRidden
    Fired when an entity's updateRidden method is called.
    EventWriteEntityToNBT
    Fired when an entity is written to NBT.
